title: BitScramble 3.2 - file encryption software
description:
BitScramble - FREEWARE 2016 (ver. 3.2)

BitScramble is a file encryption software for Windows. Please DO NOT LOOSE your password after encryption.
BitScramble will not store your password to anywhere nor does not leave any trace of itself in the system.
The longer password you give, the more secure the encryption will be.

.NET 3.0 required or higher.
No installation needed, just run the application.


HOW TO USE:

Run the application. Open folder where your files are. All files are shown in the list. Enter password and encrypt/decrypt files individually or all of them.
You can also encrypt/decrypt files to another location, this maintains original copy.


WARNING:


- DO NOT LOOSE/FORGET YOUR PASSWORD!!!
- YOU will take full responsibility for using this application!
- Read only files will NOT be encrypted/decrypted.
- Please DO NOT rename encrypted file names! IF you do, the real file name is lost but the file itself can still be decrypted.
- There is NO connection between YOUR password and encrypted file names! File names are encrypted with different logic and may be quite easy to crack.
- Editing encryped files with any other application (notepad for example), will most likely result that the file cannot be recognized as encryped file by bitscramble and therefore cannot be decrypted!
- Opening folder with large amount of subfolders & files might slow down the application before the list is shown, be patient...


I developed this application as a hobby and I have been using it for years and now shareing with anyone who is interested.
I recommend keeping this application in a separate flash drive so only YOU can open folders with encrypted files and see the real file names.
Please give your feedback, suggestions or any bugs you might find...




Enjoy!
